name: Book Ed.1 Reference Scenario
description: The reference adoption used for the Book First Edition is, as most solutions, based on a fixed percentage of the Total Addressable Market (TAM), hence if the TAM data chane, the reference adoption also change. For this update, new TAM data were added resulting a different reference adoption scenario, so this former reference scenario is stored here for use in the Book Ed.1 scenario results.

name: Telepresence Share of Business Aviation Market is Fixed
description: Drawdown calculations for REF adoption of Telepresence based on market estimates collected for 2011-2014 (linearly extrapolated to 2015-2018). We reproduce the calculations in this model for REF adoption estimation. For future years, the standard Drawdown assumption of fixed adoption (from 2018) in percentage of TAM is applied. The TAM used is the average of Baseline TAM's.
